languages.text: "Да? Я бы в тот момент предпочел находиться как можно дальше от глубокоуважаемой госпожи Чорда..."
"Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."
languages.original_text: "Да? Я бы в тот момент предпочел находиться как можно дальше от глубокоуважаемой госпожи Чорда..."

traits.locale_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “你是认真的吗？在这种情况下，我更宁愿离尊敬的库尔达大人远远的……”
languages.original_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."

traits.locale_text: “你是认真的吗？在这种情况下，我更宁愿离尊敬的库尔达大人远远的……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Personnellement, je préfère me tenir le plus loin possible de Sa Seigneurie Chorda pour le moment... »
languages.original_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Personnellement, je préfère me tenir le plus loin possible de Sa Seigneurie Chorda pour le moment... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¿De verdad? Porque yo preferiría estar tan lejos de lady Chorda como fuera posible en ese momento».
languages.original_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad? Porque yo preferiría estar tan lejos de lady Chorda como fuera posible en ese momento».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「本当ですか？そのときは、チョーダ閣下とはなるべく距離を置きたいものですな…」
languages.original_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."

traits.locale_text: 「本当ですか？そのときは、チョーダ閣下とはなるべく距離を置きたいものですな…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Wirklich? Ich hätte es vorgezogen, in diesem Augenblick möglichst weit entfernt von ihre Ladyschaft Chorda zu sein ..."
languages.original_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Wirklich? Ich hätte es vorgezogen, in diesem Augenblick möglichst weit entfernt von ihre Ladyschaft Chorda zu sein ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."

languages.text: "Öyle mi? Bense şu anda Leydi Chorda Hazretleri'nden mümkün olduğunca uzakta olmak istiyorum..."
languages.original_text: "Really? I would prefer to be as far away from Her Ladyship Chorda as possible at that moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi? Bense şu anda Leydi Chorda Hazretleri'nden mümkün olduğunca uzakta olmak istiyorum..."
